data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Diostracus Loew from Tibet, with a key to the Himalayan fauna (Diptera, Dolichopodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Ning, Wang, Baohai, Yang, Ding (2015): Two new species of the genus Diostracus Loew from Tibet, with a key to the Himalayan fauna (Diptera, Dolichopodidae). ZooKeys 488: 91-104, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.488.8919, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.488.8919
